actions.name: Internal: Review Default Settlement Statement Fee Overlap
actions.display_name: Review Default Settlement Statement Fee Overlap
actions.description: A default settlement fee for a partner can't be added because a settlement fee with a different amount exists on the same line.

actions.name: Internal: Patriot Act Hit
actions.description: This file has a Patriot Act hit.  Please review the information.

actions.name: Internal: Review Curative Action
actions.description: A curative has been cleared via the website.  This action will auto complete when the curative is either internally cleared or re-worked.

actions.name: Internal: Settlement Statement Change Request
actions.description: A change to the Settlement Statement has been requested on the website.

actions.name: Internal: New File Note Review
actions.description: A new note that comes from the user on the website when placing the order.

actions.name: Internal: Email Failure
actions.display_name: Email Failure: When sending action email from _Name_
actions.description: When an email fails within ResWare (not outside of ResWare) this action will appear.

actions.name: Internal: Possible duplicate order
actions.description: The system has found a file that has a similar address.  Please review to avoid duplicate work.

actions.name: Internal: File Blacklisted
actions.description: This file has something that has been found on the blacklist.  Please consult with the Admin to review the to see if the hit is positive.

actions.name: Internal: Incoming Email
actions.description: This is an incoming email.

actions.name: Internal: File Information Updated
actions.description: A website user has saved the update file info/fees page.

actions.name: Internal: Closing Ordered
actions.description: A closing has been ordered via the website.

actions.name: Internal: Closing Modified
actions.description: The signing has been modified via the website.

actions.name: Internal: Search Data - Multiple Prior Liens/Reqs Added
actions.display_name: Search Data - Multiple Prior Liens/Reqs Added
actions.description: When more than one lien is added to the Search Data tab and the automation to add the prior loan information on the Policy tab is in play.  You will need to add the applicable prior loan information on the policy tab manually.

actions.name: Internal: Underwriter Maximum Coverage Amount Exceeded
actions.display_name: Internal: Underwriter Maximum Coverage Amount Exceeded
actions.description: This loan amount and/or sales price has been raised higher than the maximum coverage amount programmed on the U/W and state for this file.  Please note this will only trigger on existing files where the loan/sales price are initially under the max amount but are changed above.

actions.name: Internal: Signing: Canceled via Website
actions.description: The signing has been cancelled via the website.

actions.name: Simplifile: Documents Rejected
actions.description: Simplifile has rejected some documents.

actions.name: Internal: No Rate Type Assigned - Over Max Coverage Amount
actions.display_name: No Rate Type Assigned - Over Max Coverage Amount
actions.description: This action appears when a rate type has a max coverage amount.  When the max coverage amount is met, the system has removed all rate type and nothing is assigned.

actions.name: Internal: Tracked Document Downloaded
actions.description: This action is to advise when a tracked document has been downloaded from the recipient.

actions.name: CLO: Import and Review UCD
actions.description: Please go to the document tab and change the doc type to UCD.

actions.name: Product Changed
actions.description: Product was modified and changed by an Admin

actions.name: Product Type Partner Missing
actions.description: Please remove the Product Type partner type placeholder on the General Tab and add the correct partner type for this file.

external_action.name: Search Data: Multiple Prior Liens Added

complete_emails.name: *To Client: Order Confirmation - Sad Path
complete_emails.subject: THANK YOU FOR THE ORDER!
complete_emails.body:
States Title has received your order for Loan Number _GetLoanNumber_1_.

Your States Title Order Number is _GetFileNumber_1_.

A Preliminary Closing Disclosure has been instantly prepared and is attached to this email.

We are working on your order and will provide you with a Title Commitment within 48-72 hours.

complete_emails.name: *To Client: Borrower's Auth Request
complete_emails.subject: Borrower’s Authorization Request
complete_emails.body: In order to help us clear title and resolve outstanding mortgage requirements, please provide a signed Borrower’s authorization at your earliest convenience.

complete_emails.name: *To Payoff Lender 1 - Order Payoff
complete_emails.subject: Order Payoff
complete_emails.body: Requesting payoff for the attached referenced loan.

actions.name: TC: Review & Enter Commitment Data
actions.description: Enter vesting, mortgages, property taxes, etc.

actions.name: TC: Review for Clear to Close

complete_emails.name: *To Lender: CTC Notification
complete_emails.subject: Clear to Close
complete_emails.body: We are writing to inform you that barring a change in circumstance, _GetFileNumber_1_ has been cleared of all liens and encumbrances and is now clear to close. If a change in circumstance does occur, e.g. changes to the loan amount, discovery of new lien requiring subordination, or addition of another borrower to the loan, please notify us as soon as possible so that we can review changes to title, if any.

complete_emails.name: *To Client: Commitment Package
complete_emails.subject: _CD_Underwriter for Title Email_21_
complete_emails.body: _CD_Check For Taxes_12_

complete_emails.name: *To Client: Commitment Doc (Real EC)
complete_emails.subject: _CD_Underwriter for Title Email_21_
complete_emails.body: _CD_Check For Taxes_12_

start_emails.name: *To Lender: Vesting Issue
start_emails.subject: Vesting Issue Found
start_emails.body:
The name(s) we have on file for this transaction are:

_GetBuyerSellerNamesWithVesting_Buyer_1_

The name(s) returned with our search package are:

_GetSearchDataVesting_1_

Please advise if we will need to order a deed.

We [do/do not] anticipate this extending the clear to close timeline [by length of time if it extends]. We estimate that this will cost the borrower _CF_Estimated.Deed.Recording.Fee_8_.

actions.name: CUR: Clear to Close Delay Notification

complete_emails.name: **To Client: CTC Delay
complete_emails.subject: Clear to Close Delay
complete_emails.body: We are waiting on [Item] from [entity or person] before we can clear [issue]. We requested this from [Entity/Person] and [Entity/Person] on [Date] and [Date]. Once [the Item] is received, we expect to be clear to close in [time to resolution].

complete_emails.name: *To Notary: Scheduling Request
complete_emails.subject: New Scheduling Request
complete_emails.body:
Please review the request below. If you cannot accomidate this request, please let us know ASAP.

Signing Date/Time & Location:
_GetSigningDateTime_1_
_GetSigningAddress_1_
_GetSigningAddressCityStateZip_1_

_GetSigningAddressMapURL_1_

complete_emails.name: *To Client: Scheduling Confirmation
complete_emails.subject: Closing Schedule Confirmation
complete_emails.body: We are writing to inform you that the closing for _GetFileNumber_1_ has been successfully scheduled for _GetEstimatedSettlementDateLong_1_. If you haven’t done so already, please provide us with the closing instructions at your earliest convenience.

actions.name: CLO: Send Docs to Notary for Signing

complete_emails.name: *To Notary: Closing Package
complete_emails.subject: Documents for Signing
complete_emails.body: Please login to download the documents for the above referenced signing.

complete_emails.subject: CD for Approval
complete_emails.body: Please review the attached CD and responed with any changes or approval.

complete_emails.name: *To Lender: Revised CD Approval
complete_emails.subject: Revised CD for Review
complete_emails.body: Please review the attached revised CD.

complete_emails.name: *To Client: Closing Incomplete Notification
complete_emails.subject: Notification of incomplete signing
complete_emails.body:
We are writing to inform you that the previously scheduled closing for _GetBuyerSellerNames_Buyer_1_] for _GetFileNumber_1_ at _GetEstimatedSettlementDate_1_ did not close as scheduled due to _CF_No.Sign.Reasons_4_.

We will _CF_No.Sign.Resolution_7_  and notify you upon resolution.

actions.name: POL: Verify Policy Information
actions.description:
Validate the parameters that go into policy generation.
 - loan amount
 - endorsements
 - legal description and vesting
 - curative items have been cured
 - mortgage date and effective date are filled in on the policy tab

complete_emails.name: **To Client: Request Mortgage Statement
complete_emails.subject: Requesting and Updating Portfolio Payoff Statement
complete_emails.body:
In order to help us accurately quote title fees on the preliminary ALTA Settlement Statement, we are requesting the following mortgage statements:

_GetSettlementLineAmount_401_1_

Please provide at your earliest convenience. 

** NEED SQL TO CREATE PULL FIELD FOR PAYOFF INFO

Please contact us by phone or email to resolve.
